abstract: Vodafone, the British telecommunications giant, said Monday it had no plans to bid for United States-based Verizon Communications, denying a media report. “Vodafone wishes to make it clear that it has no plans to make such an offer,” it said in a brief statement.
lead_paragraph: Vodafone, the British telecommunications giant, said Monday it had no plans to bid for United States-based Verizon Communications, denying a media report. “Vodafone wishes to make it clear that it has no plans to make such an offer,” it said in a brief statement.
